flawed_nl_solution:
A quarter of the balls are red and therefore there are 360 x (1 / 4) = <<360*(1/4)=90>>90 red balls.
When you remove the red balls from the ball pit there are 360 - 90 = <<360-90=720>>720 remaining balls
A fifth of the remaining balls are blue, and therefore there are 720 x (1 / 5) = <<720*(1/5)=144>>144 blue balls.
The total of red and blue balls equals 90 + 144 = <<90+144=234>>234 balls
When you remove the red and blue balls from the total there are 360 - 234 = <<360-234=126>>126 balls that are neither red nor blue.
#### 126

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 270, not 720. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
